alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:25PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cuyahoga and northeastern Lorain Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Ridgeville, or 9 miles east of Elyria, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Solon, Twinsburg, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, Highland Hills, North Olmsted, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, Maple Heights and South Euclid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
